Message.Title: ghetto securtiy
Message.Msg: There's is growth potential in the low income neighborhoods, once they put in the new security service. Insurance is pricing the low value homes out ofthe market. The camera systems work stopping crime and landlords like being ableto keep an eye on their property. In my area" every" home for blocks has an ADT sign.

Not only will they buy the security but once they get that they will get the whole bundle at a ghetto income price. I wish I could get everything on 1 bill. Upgrades should come to low income areas 1st!
video sceurity is what is stopping/turning around the housing price slide. Insurance compaines love them too.
The cat would be too. The camera system is the one that everyone is buying.
